altername_name: Yi Men Ying Lie: Yang Jia Jiang
Yí Mén Yīng Liè: Yáng Jiā Jiàng
Clan of Heroes: Generals of the Yang Family
Yang Jia Jiang - Yang Warrior Family
name: Clan of Heroes: Generals of the Yang Family
overview: Clan of Heroes: Generals of the Yang Family is a beat'em up that is based off the story several old Chinese stories and Folklore Songs. Choose between 4 playable warriors to defend your country from foreign military invaders. This title was originally released exclusively in China. Piko Interactive acquired the full rights of the game to localize it to English speaking players. The game has been completely re-hauled fixing many of the original bugs and play ability problems. There is a lot of polishing done to the fighting and collision engine. Over all the game was worked up to be finally enjoyable from beginning to end.
